column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We actually got seated in about 15 minutes rather than half an hour. Our salad came first. I ordered it with dressing on the side
column2: but when the salad came the dressing was no where to be seen. We were sitting in the corer by the window so it was hard to flag down a waiter to get dressing. However once we got to our waiter
column3: he brought us the dressing soon after. Even though we preordered the pizza
column4: we still waited for a some time for them. It's just the nature of the dish
column5: so I would definitely recommend preordering the pizza.
